entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle late this morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
